<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines an action performed when player clicked on group marker (3D or in a map). The code executed once. This EH, unlike [[onGroupIconOverEnter]] and [[onGroupIconOverLeave]], has one more param which returns 1 if RMB was pressed, 0 otherwise. <br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Since '''Arma 3''' ''v1.57'' a stackable version of this EH is available: [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/addMissionEventHandler#GroupIconClick|GroupIconClick]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onGroupIconClick''' command

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> command: [[String]] or [[Code]] - script

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[onGroupIconClick]]
{
    // Passed values for _this are:
    _is3D = _this [[select]] 0;
    _group = _this [[select]] 1;
    _wpID = _this [[select]] 2;
    _RMB = _this [[select]] 3;
    _posx = _this [[select]] 4;
    _posy = _this [[select]] 5;
    _shift = _this [[select]] 6;
    _ctrl = _this [[select]] 7;
    _alt = _this [[select]] 8;

    _message = [[format]] ["____ Info ____"];
    {_message = _message + [[format]] ["\n %1",_x]} [[forEach]] _this;
    [[hint]] _message;
}</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addGroupIcon]], [[clearGroupIcons]], [[getGroupIcon]], [[getGroupIconParams]], [[groupIconSelectable]], [[groupIconsVisible]], [[removeGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIconParams]], [[setGroupIconsSelectable]], [[setGroupIconsVisible]], [[onGroupIconOverEnter]], [[onGroupIconOverLeave]]
</value></part></template>
